decentralized.description: Users donâ€™t have to put trust in a central authority. decentralized networks are run by the participants themselves. This means that the entire system becomes more distributed.

smartContracts.description: A protocol intended to digitally facilitate, verify, or enforce the negotiation or performance of a contract. Smart contracts allow the performance of credible transactions without third parties.

stakingRewards.description: Staking is the process of holding funds in a cryptocurrency wallet to support the operations of a blockchain network. Users are rewarded simply for holding coins.

carbonNeutral.description: The transaction confirmations is not done with hardware that requires alot of energy intake, but with already owned coins in the software wallet.

community.description: Runebase has a positive and encouraging community with tangible impact on individual fulfillment. The community share similar values that cooperate to help accomplish several goals.
